languages.text: "Впрочем, это не предел моих замыслов. Во вселенной есть другие Осколки, подобные этому. Я намерен отыскать и их, чтобы заключить в Ярмо. Каждый покоренный монстр будет укреплять нашу оборону".

"That is not the full extent of my vision. There are other Shards similar to this one, scattered across the galaxy. I plan on seeking them out and confining them all inside the Yoke. Each conquered monstrosity will bolster our defences."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, это не предел моих замыслов. Во вселенной есть другие Осколки, подобные этому. Я намерен отыскать и их, чтобы заключить в Ярмо. Каждый покоренный монстр будет укреплять нашу оборону".

traits.locale_text: "That is not the full extent of my visions, however. There are other Shards similar to this one, scattered around the universe. I am planning on seeking them all out and confine them all in the Yoke. Each conquered monster is going to bolster our defences."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "That is not the full extent of my visions, however. There are other Shards similar to this one, scattered around the universe. I am planning on seeking them all out and confine them all in the Yoke. Each conquered monster is going to bolster our defences."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "That's not the full extent of my visions, though. There are other Shards similar to this one, scattered around the universe. I am planning on seeking them all out and confining them all inside the Yoke. Each conquered monster is going to bolster our defences."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "That's not the full extent of my visions, though. There are other Shards similar to this one, scattered around the universe. I am planning on seeking them all out and confining them all inside the Yoke. Each conquered monster is going to bolster our defences."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "That is not the full extent of my vision, however. There are other Shards similar to this one, scattered across the universe. I plan on seeking them out and confining them all inside the Yoke. Each conquered monster will bolster our defences."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "That is not the full extent of my vision. There are other Shards similar to this one, scattered across the galaxy. I plan on seeking them out and confining them all inside the Yoke. Each conquered monstrosity will bolster our defences."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Mon plan est bien plus vaste. Il y a d'autres Échardes semblables à celle-ci, dispersées dans la galaxie. Je compte partir à leur recherche et toutes les enfermer dans le Joug. Chaque monstruosité ainsi subjuguée renforcera nos défenses. »
languages.original_text: "That is not the full extent of my vision. There are other Shards similar to this one, scattered across the galaxy. I plan on seeking them out and confining them all inside the Yoke. Each conquered monstrosity will bolster our defences."

traits.locale_text: « Mon plan est bien plus vaste, cela dit. Il y a d'autres Échardes semblables à celle-ci, dispersées dans l'univers. Je compte partir à leur recherche et toutes les enfermer dans le Joug. Chaque monstre ainsi subjugué renforcera nos défenses. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Pues esa no es toda la extensión de mi visión. Hay más fragmentos similares a este repartidos por toda la galaxia. Tengo intención de dar con todos ellos y encerrarlos en el Yugo. Cada monstruo conquistado reforzará nuestras defensas».
languages.original_text: "That is not the full extent of my vision. There are other Shards similar to this one, scattered across the galaxy. I plan on seeking them out and confining them all inside the Yoke. Each conquered monstrosity will bolster our defences."

traits.locale_text: «Pero esa no es toda la extensión de mi visión. Hay más fragmentos similares a este por todo el universo. Tengo intención de dar con todos ellos y encerrarlos en el Yugo. Cada monstruo conquistado reforzará nuestras defensas».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “我的全部愿景不止于此。这个宇宙中还散落着很多类似的碎片，我打算把它们全都找出来，把所有碎片都关在圣枷之中。这样一来，每只被我们征服的怪物，都会让我们的防线变得更加牢不可破。”
languages.original_text: "That is not the full extent of my vision. There are other Shards similar to this one, scattered across the galaxy. I plan on seeking them out and confining them all inside the Yoke. Each conquered monstrosity will bolster our defences."

traits.locale_text: “然而，我的全部愿景不止于此。这个宇宙中还散落着很多类似的碎片，我打算把它们全都找出来，把所有碎片都关在圣枷之中。这样一来，每只被我们征服的怪物，都会让我们的防线变得更加牢不可破。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Das ist noch nicht das vollständige Ausmaß meiner Visionen. In der Galaxis sind noch andere Fragmente wie dieses verstreut. Ich habe vor, sie alle zu finden und sie alle in diesem Joch zu verschließen. Jedes besiegte Monster wird unsere Verteidigung stärken."
languages.original_text: "That is not the full extent of my vision. There are other Shards similar to this one, scattered across the galaxy. I plan on seeking them out and confining them all inside the Yoke. Each conquered monstrosity will bolster our defences."

traits.locale_text: "Aber das ist noch nicht das vollständig Ausmaß meiner Visionen. Im Universum sind noch andere Fragmente wie dieses verstreut. Ich habe vor, sie alle zu finden und sie alle in diesem Joch zu verschließen. Jedes besiegte Monster wird unsere Verteidigung stärken."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「私のビジョンはそれだけではない。これと似たようなシャードが宇宙には他にも散らばっているのだ。私はそれらをすべて探し出し、ヨークの中に閉じ込めるつもりでいる。征服した怪物はそれぞれが、我々の防御を強化することになる」
languages.original_text: "That is not the full extent of my vision. There are other Shards similar to this one, scattered across the galaxy. I plan on seeking them out and confining them all inside the Yoke. Each conquered monstrosity will bolster our defences."

traits.locale_text: 「私のビジョンはそれだけではない。これと似たようなシャードが宇宙には他にも散らばっているのだ。私はそれらをすべて探し出し、ヨークの中に閉じ込めるつもりでいる。征服した怪物はそれぞれが、我々の防御を強化することになる」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Aklımdakiler bu kadar da değil. Galaksinin dört bir yanında buna benzer Parçalar var. Onları bulup Boyunduruk'un içine hapsetmeyi planlıyorum. Fethettiğimiz her bir canavar, savunmamızı güçlendirecek."
languages.original_text: "That is not the full extent of my vision. There are other Shards similar to this one, scattered across the galaxy. I plan on seeking them out and confining them all inside the Yoke. Each conquered monstrosity will bolster our defences."
